column.name: description
column.value: True 4K UHD. It is incredibly captivating LG UHD TVs exceed your expectations every time. With four times more pixels than Full HD resolution, you can experience realistic image quality and vivid colors.

column.name: description
column.value: Television - SMART OLED, 4K Ultra HD, 100Hz, HDR10, HLG, DVB-T2/S2/C, H.265/HEVC, 4× HDMI, 3× USB, CI+, recording to USB, LAN, WiFi, Bluetooth, DLNA, Miracast, HbbTV 2.0, gamer mode.

column.name: description
column.value: Talbot melamine desk with natural finish, and legs in a black finish, 120 x 60 cm
